title: BadgerDAO Loan for Bootstrapping Vault Boost - Motion
body:
It is motioned to lend the BadgerDAO a sum of 500,000 MTA for 90 days in order to help bootstrap the MTA boost received for users in the imBTC and mBTC/HBTC Vaults once they get deployed on the [Badger dApp](https://app.badger.finance/).

The loan is given in a trustless fashion, which is achieved by depositing and staking the loaned MTA in a VoterProxy contract that is managed by both the mStable core contributor team and the BadgerDAO. 

After the term ends, the MTA will flow back into the mStableDAO treasury, and accrued rewards from this loan will remain in the VoterProxy contract.

Depending on initial success of these vaults, the loan duration can potentially be extended, which will mandate an additional formal vote by Meta Governors at least 14 days before the extension would take place.

**Should this motion be brought forward and shared as a public proposal on the mStable forum and Snapshot page?**
